title: Fantasy Dreams - Volume 1
description: 6 magical full length themes for RPG, fantasy and medieval adventures with multiple loops and shorter edits
longDescription:
Preview the collection on:

  • YouTube


"Fantasy Dreams - Volume 1" features 6 magical full length themes for RPG, fantasy and medieval adventures with multiple loops and shorter edits.


  • Fairy Village: Full length (02:08), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops - (Light): Full length (02:08), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Angels Choir: Full length (03:01), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops - (Light): Full length (03:00), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Village In The Woods: Full length (02:07), 3 Short edits, 4 Loops - (Light): Full length (02:07), 3 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Tales Of The 3 Dragons: Full length (02:32), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Medieval Bright Days: Full length (01:53), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops - (Light): Full length (01:53), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Oniric Flute: Full Length (02:52), 1 Alt. ending, 1 Short edit, 4 Loops - (No Lead): Full Length (02:50), 1 Alt. ending, 1 Short edit, 4 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.Â
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 6 Full length tracks
  • 16 Short edits
  • 39 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 67

Number of Audio Cues: 67

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 22:35

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
